snippet.title: Commodore Plus/4 -Petals Of Doom
snippet.description:
Me playing Petals Of Doom on Commodore Plus/4 - 1985

The aim of this game: As a space pot farmer you have to watch your weed to grow up and to prevent it eaten by some sort of hooked aliens! ;-)

Seriously, this game has an odd aim. 
Yes, you have to watch the plants to grow up and you have to prevent it eaten up by flying aliens. You can shoot them down and you just have to wait until all plants have grown up. Don't get hit by the aliens, they will lower your energy.

And that's it.

Great, eh? ;-)
